name: What Goes Around (A Lone Man)
description:
IF THE SCREEN IS TOO BIG TRY ZOOMING OUT THE BROWSER, SORRY!

My solo GMTK 2022 submission. The theme was 'Roll of the Dice' and I incorporated that into the enemy behaviors. 

'What Goes Around' is a bullet hell shooter where you must be careful with every shot you take. Bullets never de-spawn, so you'll be running around dodging your own shots as you take out enemies and race to the finish.
